mapper.select: select m_id, m_nickname, m_pic, m_introduce from profile where m_id=#{m_id}
mapper.update: update article set article_like=(select article_like from article where article_id=#{article_id})+1 where article_id=#{article_id}
update article set article_share=(select article_share from article where article_id=#{article_id})+1 where article_id=#{article_id}
mapper.select: select re.reply_id, re.m_id, re.pic_id, re.article_id, re.reply_like, re.reply_text, re.reply_date, (select count(*) from re_reply rr where rr.reply_id=re.reply_id) rereply_count from reply re where article_id=#{article_id}
mapper.update: update article set article_reply=(select article_reply from article where article_id=#{article_id})+1 where article_id=#{article_id}
update reply set reply_like=(select reply_like from reply where reply_id=#{reply_id})+1 where reply_id=#{reply_id}
mapper.select: select * from reply where article_id=#{article_id} and rownum <= 5 order by reply_like desc
